p:
Some mosquito-borne tropical diseases are deemed important and have been studied, aiming to apply nanotechnology for the production of new drugs to treat diseases such as dengue and malaria
49 . Nanotechnology aids in drug delivery, using biological organisms or nanoparticles (that can be made of metals such as gold) making drugs more disease-specific
49 . There are no nanodrugs been studied for YF yet, since it is a neglected disease, but there have been studies on nanopharmaceuticals for malaria, which shares the same vector as YF
49 .
